items.sentence: There's a good chance that this is Tom's umbrella.
Tom is the one that'll drive Mary to the hospital.
Tom can count from one to ten in thirty languages.
It took us more than three hours to get to Boston.
After Tom transplanted the trees, he watered them.
I'm going to try to persuade Tom to do that today.
Are you sure Tom won't mind if I sleep in his bed?
Is that person over there by the window your boss?
I want to buy this, but I don't have enough money.
Do you want to be a famous actor when you grow up?
